website_summaries.verdict: Wide, sturdy supports and a low-profile design make this gymnastic balance beam good for beginners.
pros: Solid wood core with suede outer layer and steel support beams
cons: No way to make this beam any higher as gymnasts advance their skills

customer_reviews.title: For Daughter's Gymnastics
customer_reviews.text: Serves its purpose during the Covid 19 lock down. It is not as long as a competition / gym beam (16 feet) but she does leaps, and turns on it as well as it accommodates one back handspring. She is a level 10. This is all we had room for.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Item
customer_reviews.text: We've only had this for a very short period of time, but my 9 year old daughter who takes gymnastics loves it. Very sturdy and quality build. The supports/legs took a whole 5 minutes at most to attach with 8 screws provided.
customer_reviews.author: Kenai Cabo

customer_reviews.title: High quality fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this and uses it all the time. The quality of the surface is excellent and she enjoys the contact it gives her. It sits very stably on its supports so there are no concerns when she's using it. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. McCandless

customer_reviews.title: Great for Level 7 Training at Home
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's gym has closed bc of covid-19. But, she still has daily team 3 hr workouts and uses this beam for conditioning and skills training. It isn't as long as competition beam, but its sturdy and long enough for back/front walkers, back/front handsprings.
customer_reviews.author: MMI

customer_reviews.title: My gymnasts love this beam
customer_reviews.text: This beam has been perfect during quarantine for use with my girls virtual gymnastics classes. Sturdy and they say it feels very similar to the beam they use in the gym. They feel secure doing handstands, leaps and back and front walkovers on this beam.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old loves this. Very authentic and close to the ground so she can practice in her room. Easy to assemble and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Carol-Ann

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Solid beam. Worth the price. Very easy to put together and my kids are enjoying it. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Solid Beam
customer_reviews.text: We use this for our classes with special needs population at Team GUTS and it's been great!
customer_reviews.author: TeamGUTS

customer_reviews.title: Hit of the play room
customer_reviews.text: It’s the ‘hit’ of the play room..... all the kids try to walk on it including some of the parents! It is exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Blanco NM

customer_reviews.title: It’s great quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is on the gymnastics beam and this beam is quality! It’s perfect and sturdy and thick it’s really great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great for home practice
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and a great replica for home use. It was easy to set up. My daughter loves having the chance to practice safely at home.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Ripped
customer_reviews.text: Just got the item out of the box for Christmas and found it damaged.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter. She loves it! It is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Karensue

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Exceeds expectations. My level 8 competitive gymnast loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Clements

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My girls love practising on this. It's hard to get them off of it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality. My daughter is in her 2nd year of competition and she loves having this at home. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Joshua D Stubbs

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product and it was delivered in a timely, efficient manner...Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Boon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful beam
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful beam, bought it for my 9 year old, she's about 50 pounds to practice at home. She loves it and it is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: LindaX

customer_reviews.title: She loved it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter truly loved it. The craftmanship is also very well built.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality!!! Perfect for anyone that needs a beam at home!
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: tear should have been caught during manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: Beam was fine except for a tear in the suede on the side.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: she is very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: this is the birthday gift for my girlfriend.she is very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kylan

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 14 yr old daughter...she LOVES it...it's high quality and is providing her with hours of extra beam time in between gym practices...
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Murphy

product_meta.title: Juperbsky Off-Ground Gymnastic Suede Wood Balance Beam, Tan (8-Feet)
feature_bullets: ✅TOP QUALITY. Competition grade 8 foot wood padded beam with suede cover for professional feel and finish. Solid construction, non-slip feet, and locking adjustments are committed to your safety.

✅COURAGE AND CONFIDENCE BUILDER. Because our beam is close to the ground, parents can feel safe letting their child try out tricks whether they are using it as a fun toy or trainer equipment for new skills. Great for any boys girls toddler and teen gymnasts.

✅COACHES AND YOUNG GYMNASTS LOVE. Juperbsky gymnastics beam is perfect for a child toddler or an experienced gymnast who is looking to practice new skills. Beginner gymnasts will get to learn new skills and experienced ones will continue to practice and become even better!

✅CORRECT LENGTH AND WIDTH. At 8ft long with a 4in balancing surface our junior gymnastics pad is a high quality low beam for girls looking to practice moves such as handspring, cartwheel, handstand, leap, jumps, walkovers, and kicks.

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐BUY NOW WITH CONFIDENCE. If you're not 100% satisfied for any reason, simply return your Beam for a FULL REFUND with no questions asked. Click the Add to Cart button now. You'll be happy you did!
